data.eml:eml: Overview of Candoninae (Crustacea, Ostracoda) of South America and the West Indies, with the description of two new species and one new genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Karanovic, Ivana, Datry, Thibault (2009): Overview of Candoninae (Crustacea, Ostracoda) of South America and the West Indies, with the description of two new species and one new genus. Zootaxa 2267: 1-25, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190875
